Farscape Module

Houston, this is Farscape One, I am free and flying

From Mike-NZ and CommanderSpock comes a sci-fi hot rod for jetting all around the Kerbal system. It's the Farscape module.

Farscape from KerbalStuff

Farscape from Curse

Comes with 2 variations:

Farscape One - with a limited (but powerful) engine running off of standard fuel and oxidizer, perfect for testing out slingshot maneuvers or when you just want to get away from it all.

Farscape (Hetch) - which is gonna haul you anywhere you want to go at near-ludicrous speeds. You'll feel like you were shot out of a wormhole. Moya's Hetch drive is alien technology, so handle with care. Note to hot shots, don't try to go full throttle with this bad boy in low atmo, the air will rip you apart in under 20 seconds flat. Handle that throttle with care.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

A great mod for kids and astronauts new to the game. Can be hideously overpowered, but, as it's based on a sci-fi ship designed for high-speed flight testing, we think it's a good choice for zipping around the Uncharted Territories.

Look upward and share the wonders I've seen - John Crichton

Also comes with an IASA flag for your flagpole
